name: International Capital Strategies LLC
membership:
We have non-resident and adjunct senior fellow relationships with the US Council on Foreign Relations (https://www.cfr.org/expert/heidi-e-crebo-rediker) and Brookings Institution (https://www.brookings.edu/experts/douglas-a-rediker/)
These are not memberships and are independent of International Capital Strategies, but are disclosed here nonetheless.
goal: Analysis of geo-economic issues and political economy, including EU and Eurozone issues.  Interpretation of U.S. and multilateral policy and political issues. Emphasis on understanding U.S. and other major political and economic actor policies and implications for and from other countries and regions on global political economy.
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: We follow and attempt to understand and interpret macro and other economic policy issues and implications, seen through a political economy prism.  Attempt to interpret U.S. policy and politics for Trans-Atlantic political economy issues.
